markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Secret Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2843) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets. Once per day, you can cast [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239) as an innate occult spell.
name: Secret Eyes
